pages.text: Created with all the knowledge you have gathered, you have created the Spirit Instiller. It serves to be able to connect the energies of two items, with the help of a third object to bind them.$(br2)An almost spiritual process.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: The Spirit Instiller needs a focus structure to work. To rotate the structure hologram in the direction you want it to, click on the placed Spirit Instiller itself.

pages.name: Instiller Structure
pages.text: Dimensions: 8x9x5 blocks$(br)It can be enhanced using $(l:magical_blocks/upgrades)Upgrades$() by placing them on the two $(item)Onyx Chiseled Blocks$().
